metadata.description: Comprehensive Claude Code skills marketplace: collaboration, testing, debugging, and more

universal.name: Universal Skills Pack
universal.description: Essential skills for all Claude Code users: collaboration, problem-solving, and research
universal.install_command: /plugin install collaboration-skills@claude-power-user && /plugin install problem-solving-skills@claude-power-user && /plugin install research-skills@claude-power-user

developer.name: Developer Skills Pack
developer.description: Developer-focused skills: testing, debugging, and architecture patterns
developer.install_command: /plugin install testing-skills@claude-power-user && /plugin install debugging-skills@claude-power-user && /plugin install architecture-skills@claude-power-user

power-user.name: Power User Pack
power-user.description: Meta skills for customizing and extending Claude Code capabilities

complete.name: Complete Skills Pack
complete.description: All available skills - the complete claude-power-user experience
complete.install_command: /plugin install collaboration-skills@claude-power-user && /plugin install testing-skills@claude-power-user && /plugin install debugging-skills@claude-power-user && /plugin install meta-skills@claude-power-user && /plugin install problem-solving-skills@claude-power-user && /plugin install research-skills@claude-power-user && /plugin install architecture-skills@claude-power-user
